name: Bath salt
title: Kneipp · Bath salt · Arnika
description: Kneipp Bath salt Arnika Warming and invigorating care

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Ingredients: Sodium Chloride, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Pinus Mugo Leaf Oil, Pinus Sylvestris Cone Extract,Citrus Sinensis Peel Oil Expressed, Abies Sibirica Oil, Cedrus Deodara Wood Oil, Myrocarpus Frondosus Wood Oil, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Limonene,Linalool, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Polysorbate 20, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, GlycerylStearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tocopherol, CI 47005, CI 15985.

usageInformation.usage: Fill 3/4 of the lid with bath crystals and add them to the approx. 36-38°C warm bath water. For optimal bathing pleasure, bathe for 15-20 minutes.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: The Kneipp Arnica Active Bath Crystals with valuable arnica extract and natural essential oils from Cabreuva, rosemary and Pinus species give you a soothing, warming and reactivating bathing experience. In combination with the cleansing and soothing effect of warm water, the essential oils unfold their natural fragrance effect. Herbal active ingredients. Without paraffin, silicone and mineral oils. Tolerance dermatologically confirmed. We care for animals. We live sustainability.

remarks.value: Nicht einnehmen und für Kinder unzugänglich aufbewahren. Nicht mit empfindlichen Gegenständen in Kontakt bringen.
